meanings.sent1: She was hypercautious when crossing the busy street.
meanings.sent2: The hypercautious driver always double-checked before changing lanes.
meanings.sent3: The hypercautious squirrel refused to take any risks, even for extra nuts.
meanings.sent4: His hypercautious nature was like a shield against unexpected dangers.
meanings.sent5: The hypercautious hiker meticulously planned every step of the challenging trail.

meanings.definition: Showing an extreme or excessive level of caution
meanings.sent1: The hypercautious student always raised concerns about safety during experiments.
meanings.sent2: Being hypercautious, she insisted on wearing a helmet while riding a bike.
meanings.sent3: The hypercautious cat refused to play with any toy that seemed even slightly risky.
meanings.sent4: His hypercautious approach to investments saved him from financial disasters.
meanings.sent5: The hypercautious scientist meticulously checked and rechecked the lab equipment before starting the experiment.
